name: Keep Me Alive!
description:
Keep Me Alive! is an action arcade game in which you must try your hardest to survive while healing your allies. Survive as many waves as you can while you help your allies do so.

CONTROLS

WASD to MOVE

LEFT CLICK to HEAL

CREDITS
